What is this

A network of blueprints, buyers and makers, pooled together to meet your needs - housing, crops, infrastructure and other.

Incarti treats products as a file. Clone the products you're interested in and make them yourself.

Its time for production to be hyper-local. Make yourself insulated from centrally controlled commerce and track a route to Autonomy.

Its the start distributed manufacture.
